data.title: Colleges and Universities Attended by Representatives of the 108th Congress
data.text:
Order Code RL31877

Report for Congress

Received through the CRS Web

Colleges and Universities Attended by

Representatives of the 108th Congress

April 30, 2003

Mildred L. Amer

Specialist in American National Government

Government and Finance Division

Congressional Research Service Ë The Library of Congress

Colleges and Universities Attended by

Representatives of the 108th Congress

Summary

This report identifies the colleges and universities attended by Representatives

and Delegates in the 108th Congress, grouped by state. Where available in published

sources, the degrees earned are also listed.

Contents

Colleges and Universities Attended by

Representatives of the 108th Congress

The information presented in this report is drawn from the biographical section

of the Congressional Directory for the 107th Congress, 2001-2002; CQ Guide to the

New Congress, November 7, 2002; various other editions of Congressional

Quarterly Weekly Reports; [http://oncongress.cq.com/members]; and the

Biographical Directory of the American Congress, 1774-1996. The names of

institutions and degree designations are as reported in the sources. Instances in

which no degree is noted reflect the information, or lack thereof, contained in the

sources used to compile this report. Honorary degrees are not listed.
